alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 9:50PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Michigan, including the following county, Ingham. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 947 PM EDT, Radar and automated rain gauges indicated 1 to 2 inches heavy rain has fallen. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lansing, East Lansing, Edgemont Park, Okemos, Holt and Haslett. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
